arts.ttl: Everton vs Mansfield Town – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Everton and Mansfield Town meet for the first time in their histories on Wednesday night in the second round of the Carabao Cup. The historic fixture will also be the first ever cup tie played at the new Hill Dickinson Stadium. Everton christened their new home in perfect style on Sunday, beating Brighton & Hove […] The post Everton vs Mansfield Town – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.
